buttons

Class SButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • buttons.SButton

  • public class SButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents another type of button with different characteristics, adjusted for personal preference of some developers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CIRCLE 
      static int GHOST 
      static int RECTANGLE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new SButton object with the following parameters, and a light blue background color

      Creates a new SButton object with the following parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • SButton

        public SButton(java.lang.String name,
               int textSize,
               int shape,
               double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height)
        Creates a new SButton object with the following parameters, and a light blue background color
        Parameters:
        name - the display text of the button
        textSize - the text's font size
        shape - the general shape of the button (rectangle, circle, or ghost)
        x - the x-coordinate of the button
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button

      • SButton

        public SButton(java.lang.String name,
               int textSize,
               int shape,
               double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height,
               java.awt.Color col)
        Creates a new SButton object with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        name - the display text of the button
        textSize - the text's font size
        shape - the general shape of the button (rectangle, circle, or ghost)
        x - the x-coordinate of the button
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button
        col - the background color of the button

      • SButton

        public SButton(java.lang.String name,
               int textSize,
               int shape,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height)
        Creates a new SButton object with the following parameters and centered horizontally
        Parameters:
        name - the display text of the button
        textSize - the text's font size
        shape - the general shape of the button (rectangle, circle, or ghost)
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (x, y) is inside this button, otherwise false
